casebody.data:
2002-2582 (La. 10/23/02)

Gloria SCOTT, et al. v. AMERICAN TOBACCO COMPANY, INC., et al. No. 2002-CC-2582. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 23, 2002.

In re American Tobacco Co. Inc. et al.; Phillip Morris Inc.; R.J. Reynolds Tobacco Co.; Brown & Williamson Tobacco Corp.; Lorillard Tobacco Co.; Lorillard Inc.; Tobacco Institute; — Defendant(s); Applying for Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs, Parish of Orleans, Civil District Court Div. K, No. 96-8461; to the Court of Appeal, Fourth Circuit, No. 2002-C-1735.

Denied.

TRAYLOR, J., recused. VICTORY, J., would grant the writ.
